occupation: Data Science Intern at A.P. Moller - Maersk
headline: Machine Learning Enthusiast || Data Science Practitioner
summary:
Hello, I'm Sancharika Debnath, a passionate and results-driven data scientist with a strong background in information technology. Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Technology degree in Information Technology from Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, I am set to graduate in 2023 with a CGPA of 8.83.

Throughout my academic journey, I have gained knowledge in various tech stack such as Python, C++, R, Java, Next.JS, Django and SpringBoot, as well as frameworks including Sci-Kit, Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and OpenCV. I have hands-on experience in machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, and data visualization using tools like Tableau and Plotly. And trying to learn other technologies.

In terms of professional experience, I have had the opportunity to work as a Data Science Intern at Maersk Global Service Centres, where I successfully projects involving web development and data science, at HighRadius Corporation, I gained practical experience working with real-world data.

I am proud of my project accomplishments. Furthermore, I have actively contributed to the field through my publication on Hyperspectral Image Compression and Classification, where I employed CNN AutoEncoder and HybridSN for compression and classification tasks.

In addition to my technical expertise, I possess strong soft skills such as teamwork, quick learning, problem-solving, work ethic, and versatility. I thrive in collaborative environments and am committed to delivering high-quality results.

I am now seeking new opportunities to apply my skills and contribute to impactful projects in the field of data science. Feel free to reach out to me for collaboration, networking, or discussing potential opportunities.

Let's connect and explore the possibilities of working together!

experiences.title: Data Science Intern
experiences.description:
Worked on various data science related and web development related real life projects.
• Created an end-to-end web application for pre-booking seats in office premises using springboot,
next.js and internal UI developer, Anchor UI.
• Clustering of ports based on predominant features using different clustering techniques ( Best
Model : Gaussian Mixture ).
• Prediction of container turn time considering time series effects of the data.
• Prediction of change in attachment ratio percentage using various AutoML ( Best Model :
FLAML).
            

    
    

    
        Show less

experiences.title: Data Sceince Intern
experiences.description:
Developed an Automation invoice prediction system.
• Using machine learning algorithms (Best Model: XGBoost) for prediction of invoice clearance
date.
• JDBC, and React JS was used on a real world transaction database for an interactive web page.
(Accuracy: 76.15)

experiences.title: Data Science  & Business Analytics Intern
experiences.description:

• Achieved accuracy rate of 95.5

accomplishment_projects.title: Cats vs Dogs Classification
accomplishment_projects.description:
Dog and Cat Classification
Graphical user interface for Cats vs Dogs Classification (with 98.7% Accuracy) using Keras Sequential API

accomplishment_projects.title: Object Identifier
accomplishment_projects.description:
Web application for Object Identification using ResNet50

A web application where one can upload image as per ones wish and application will response with what are the object present in the image using the imagenet classification of predefined models.

accomplishment_projects.title: Sentiment Analyzer
accomplishment_projects.description: Sentiment analysis from social media reviews (tweets) using NLP.
